short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy a beautiful, flowing rainbow new tab page with clock.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flow is a constantly moving, colorful and relaxing minimal rainbow New Tab page. It has a cool clock, and saves notes too. 

Show off your beautiful Apple Retina or high DPI monitor. Relaxing, zen, ambient, beautifulâ€“ call it what you will, but there is nothing else like it. You will be MESMERIZED watching Flow's rainbow move and change colors. LGBT. IOS. OSX, Mac

Simple, clean, minimal - Flow.

Update - 9/16/2016 - Version 1.50 - Better animation, added hideable text editor area that saves and syncs with all your devices, and clicking the clock now toggles the date in the upper right corner.
Update - 11/16/2015 - Version 1.11! Much smoother animation on lower resolution screens, removed ugly spellcheck + corner
Update - 8/22/2015 - Smoother transition, bug fixes, and a tiny, persistent ToDo list added
